script.dialog: Well, they still need a little more work, but they are almost done.
What did you expect? You've seen the |shake||nu||ze||nah||norm| credits.
...Anyways, I'm here to explain a little bit about the towers for now.
You're going to find 2 new types of gifts here.
|C3|Blessings|C0| do good stuff for you, but they only last a few battles.
|C3|Burdens|C0| also only last a few battles, but they do |shake||nu||ze||nah||norm| that messes you up instead!
Monsters will always give you both |C3|Blessings and Burdens|C0| at the same time, so choose your poison carefully.
But here's the most important part of the towers, so listen up.
Monsters only level up here if you get really good scores.
Keep getting full combos and you'll be fighting me at level 20 in no time!
But if monsters do end up out of your league, then consider ruining your combo more often or something.
Or don't! I ain't your |shake||nu||ze||nah||norm| parent or guardian.
